You are a new Gaucho now. This is the first day you report to the team.
What do you want to do?
-
Your roommate and teammate Andrew invite you to a welcome party.
The time conflict with your personal scheduled training time.
-
Your good performance in NCAA make you get selected 42nd by San Antonio Spurs
Become undrafted player and return to university as part of coach team
Give up basketball career and graduate with computer science degree
-
